page.title: 12TOUR OF THE VILLAGE 2 cont.
page.content: Many of the oldest houses have been demolished. On the site of a Ghost house there is a store. Opposite the Post Office there is our Primary School. The road divides here going on and round to the right past the church and the Rectory, meeting up with the first tour at Sampford Bridge; or left towards Boobery an old road with very old cottages at the beginning and more modern houses along the way. About half way along Boobery the Brendon estate sits on the site of an old market garden. Past the Brendons and Boobery, and off towards the Canal, Beaufort Close, which leads to Richmond Close, provide Council houses. At the end Boobery joins up with Whitnage Road. To the left, almost opposite, is a lane that takes you to the old{LIME KILNS.}
